file.name: messaging.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  # Added by API Auto Mocking Plugin
  - description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
    url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/kingabesh1/zuri-chat/1.0.0
info:
  description: This is a simple API
  version: "1.0.0"
  title: Zuri Chat Messaging API
  contact:
    email: abeshekwere@gmail.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: "http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"
tags:
  - name: messaging
    description: In-app messaging
paths:
  /send_to_user:
    post:
      tags:
        - messaging
      summary: send message to user
      description: |
        Send a user a message
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/sendMessageBody"
        description: Send a message
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Message sent successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/messageSent"
        "400":
          description: bad input parameter
  /receive_message_userId:
    post:
      tags:
        - messaging
      summary: receive message from user.
      description: |
        Receive message from user. userId is id of user listening for this event
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/receiveMessageBody"
        description: Receive a message
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Message received successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/messageReceived"
        "400":
          description: bad input parameter
  /enter_room:
    post:
      tags:
        - messaging
      summary: enter a room
      description: |
        Enter a room
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/enterOrLeaveRoomBody"
        description: Enter a room
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Joined room successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/enteredRoom"
        "400":
          description: bad input parameter
  /leave_room:
    post:
      tags:
        - messaging
      summary: leave a room
      description: |
        Enter a room
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/enterOrLeaveRoomBody"
        description: Leave a room
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Left room successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/leftRoom"
        "400":
          description: bad input parameter
components:
  schemas:
    sendMessageBody:
      type: object
      required:
        - receiver_id
        - message
      properties:
        receiver_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0851
        message:
          type: string
          example: Hi Abesh
    receiveMessageBody:
      type: object
      required:
        - sender_id
        - message
      properties:
        receiver_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0853
        message:
          type: string
          example: Hi Abesh
    enterOrLeaveRoomBody:
      type: object
      required:
        - room_id
      properties:
        room_id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          example: d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0857
    messageSent:
      required:
        - status
        - message
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          example: success
        message:
          type: string
          example: Message sent successfully
        data:
          type: string
          example: null
    messageReceived:
      required:
        - status
        - message
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          example: success
        message:
          type: string
          example: Message received successfully
        data:
          type: string
          example: null
    enteredRoom:
      required:
        - status
        - message
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          example: success
        message:
          type: string
          example: Entered room successfully
        data:
          type: string
          example: null
    leftRoom:
      required:
        - status
        - message
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          example: success
        message:
          type: string
          example: Left room successfully
        data:
          type: string
          example: null
      type: object
